title: Software Company Bonds Drop As Investors' AI Worries Mount
full_text: Software Company Bonds Drop As Investors' AI Worries Mount. An anonymous reader quotes a report from Bloomberg: Investors are souring on the bonds of software companies that service industries ranging from automotive to finance as fast-paced artificial intelligence innovations threaten to upend their business models. …. Investors are souring on the bonds of software companies that service industries ranging from automotive to finance as fast-paced artificial intelligence innovations threaten to upend their business … [+936 chars]
